    • playCard

      public void playCard(int handCard, int x, int y) throws IllegalPlacementException, PlacementConditionNotMetException, IllegalActionException
      Move a Card from the Player's Hand to the Player's Field in position (x,y)
      Parameters:
      handCard - : the index of the Card the Player wants to play
      x - coordinate x of the position where the card will be placed
      y - coordinate y of the position where the card will be placed
      Throws:
      IllegalPlacementException
      PlacementConditionNotMetException
      IllegalActionException

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(PlayingDeck playingDeck) throws IllegalActionException, IllegalArgumentException
      Draws a Card from the top of the specified deck and puts it in the Player's hand
      Parameters:
      playingDeck - the deck from where the Card is drawn
      Throws:
      IllegalActionException
      IllegalArgumentException

    • grabCard

      public void grabCard(PlayingDeck playingDeck, int slot) throws IllegalActionException, IllegalArgumentException
      Grabs a Card from the specified slot and puts it in the Player's hand
      Parameters:
      playingDeck - the PlayingDeck associated to the Slots where the Player grabs the Card from
      slot - the slot from where the card is grabbed
      Throws:
      IllegalActionException - if the Card can't be grabbed because the Player already has 3 Cards in his hand
      IllegalArgumentException

    • getHandCard

      public PlayableCard getHandCard(int slot)
      Returns the card in the selected slot provided that a card is present
      Parameters:
      slot - the slot of the player's hand that contains the card that is returned
      Returns:
      the PlayingCard in position slot of hand or null when there is no card in said position. If the argument is not valid, IllegalArgumentException is thrown

    • setHandCard

      public void setHandCard(int slot, PlayableCard card)
      Setter Method for a specific Card inside the Hand. PLEASE NOTE: This Overrides the current Card in that slot. Use only if needed. Usage outside of Tests is not recommended.
      Parameters:
      slot - : the slot to put the Card in
      card - : the Card to put it place

    • getHandSize

      public int getHandSize()
      Getter Method for the size
      Returns:
      The Hand's size
